title: Freezing on loading screen!
body:
So I've tried playing league on my laptop (very decent laptop ~ runs CS:GO at like 200fps) but when i get to the loading screen (where it says everyone's champion, loading percentage etc) my laptop freezes and I can't do anything. I can't even close the game so the only thing I can do is turn off my laptop. When i try to reconnnect it does the same thing. I can't manage to play a game on my laptop even though it has good enough specs to run the game.

Specs:
-windows 10
-8gb ram
-intel i7 4700MQ
-nvidia gtx 740m 2gb
-1080x1920 screen resolution
model name: HP Envy 15 (2014 i believe).

Any suggestions would be nice. :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)? Let me know if this helps.
